articles.author: Kirsten Chuba
articles.title: Charlize Theron Calls ‘Furiosa’ “A Beautiful Film,” Says She Hasn’t Discussed Movie With Anya Taylor-Joy But “We’ve Really Been Trying to Connect” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The star weighed in on the 'Furiosa' prequel at her annual Charlize Theron Africa Outreach Project Block Party, which supported her organization as well as celebrated the team behind 'Twisters.'
articles.content:
Charlize Theron hosted the fourth annual block party for her Charlize Theron Africa Outreach Project on Saturday, where she also shared her reaction to Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga.
